title: Naturopathic Doctor Concord Nc | Genesis Herb Garden | Concord
description: Genesis Herb Garden carries natural, high quality herbs and vitamins. We have Naturopathic Doctors and Herbalists that can help you answer your health questions. We also offer in-house testing and one on one health consultations. Other services include Ionic Foot bath and Infrared Sauna.
